en.title: Love Calculator
en.seoTitle: Love Calculator - What Is Our Love Compatibility?
en.metaDescription: Free love calculator to test relationship compatibility. Enter your names and discover your love match percentage. Fun and entertaining compatibility test.
en.description: Our Love Calculator is a fun and entertaining way to test the romantic compatibility between you and your partner.

seoContent.introduction: Our Love Calculator is a fun and entertaining way to test the romantic compatibility between you and your partner. Simply enter both names to discover your love match percentage!

benefits.title: Fun & Entertaining
benefits.description: A lighthearted way to explore compatibility

benefits.title: Unlimited Tests
benefits.description: Test as many name combinations as you want

seoContent.formulaExplanation: Our love calculator uses a special algorithm that analyzes the letters in both names to generate a unique compatibility score.

examples.title: Testing with Partner
examples.description: Enter your name and partner's name

examples.title: Celebrity Crush
examples.description: Have fun testing with celebrity names

seoContent.whoItsFor: Anyone looking for a fun way to test romantic compatibility. Perfect for couples and friends.
seoContent.disclaimer: This Love Calculator is for entertainment purposes only.

faqs.question: Is it accurate?
faqs.answer: This is for entertainment only, not scientific.
